borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation of condition 2 of planning permission ref: 2021/01914/FUL granted 26th January 2022 for the 'Erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side of the existing back addition; demolition of the second floor and erection of a replacement second floor level with new roofs, rooflights, front and rear roof terraces; partial demolition of the front and rear facades, and installation of new doors and windows to replace the existing at the front and rear elevation' to allow amendments to the approved drawings to include: alterations to the rooflights at main roof level, alterations to the front fenestration to include omission of the roof terrace and alterations to rooflight in the front roofslope, addition of arches above 2no windows at first floor level, installation of 3no windows and 1no door in place of 2no windows and 1no door at ground floor level, and omission of the ground floor extension side extension, alterations to the design of the external doors to the rear elevation and to the side of ground floor back addition.
